description: VALSPAR 2000is a family of interior architectural coatings manufactured by The Sherwin-Williams Company, headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio.  VALSPAR 2000is manufactured in a number ofSherwin-Williams facilities across the United States and the data used by the LCA were representative of all Sherwin-Williams facilities in which VALSPAR 2000was produced. description: Pitt-Tech®Plusis  a  family  of  100%  acrylic  waterborne  industrial topcoats  designed  for  direct-to-metal  application.    These fast  drying with  low  odor  products provide  corrosion  protection,  chemical  and solvent  resistance.   Recommended  for  use  on  properly  prepared interior or exterior metal, masonry, plaster, and drywall surfaces.Pitt-TechPlusis available in hundreds of colors along with professional color tools from PPG THE VOICE OF COLOR® program.

description: Pitt-Tech®Plusis  a  family  of  100%  acrylic  waterborne  industrial topcoats  designed  for  direct-to-metal  application.    These fast  drying with  low  odor  products provide  corrosion  protection,  chemical  and solvent  resistance.   Recommended  for  use  on  properly  prepared interior or exterior metal, masonry, plaster, and drywall surfaces.Pitt-TechPlusis available in hundreds of colors along with professional color tools from PPG THE VOICE OF COLOR® program.
